description: This file defines an Angular component called OcnCardComponent, which renders a styled card UI element with optional header, subtitle, and footer content. It includes inputs for internal padding, title, and subtitle, and uses Angular's component decorator with inline template and styles.

classes.name: OcnCardComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that presents a styled surface card with customizable header, subtitle, content, and footer sections.

inputs.name: padding
inputs.description: Enables or disables internal padding of the card content.

inputs.name: title
inputs.description: Optional title displayed in the header.

inputs.name: subtitle
inputs.description: Optional subtitle displayed below the title.
